title: Understanding the Population
text: To determine the population the instructor is interested in, consider who the data is being collected from. The instructor wants to know about the absences of a specific group of students.

hintAnswer: All Lake Tahoe Community College math students
title: Identifying the Population
text: Think about the group of students that the instructor is focusing on. Is it all students at the college, or a specific subset?
choices: All Lake Tahoe Community College students
All Lake Tahoe Community College English students
All Lake Tahoe Community College students in her classes
All Lake Tahoe Community College math students
